allOf.description: Base substitution groups for all SWE Common objects with identification metadata
Base substitution groups for all SWE Common objects other than value objects

id.description: The ID of the object, referenceable using a URI fragment

label.description: Human readable label for the object

description.description: Human readable description of the object

description.example: Hourly average of the CPU temperature

baseProperty.description: URI pointing to the definition of the base property this property is derived from

objectType.description: URI pointing to the type of entity that the base property applies to

statistic.description: URI pointing to the definition of the statistic applied to the base property values

qualifiers.description: Additional qualifiers for the property (e.g., frequency range, measurement height, medium, etc.)

oneOf.description: Scalar component used to express truth: True or False, 0 or 1

allOf.description: Abstract base class for all data components
Base substitution groups for all SWE Common objects with identification metadata
Base substitution groups for all SWE Common objects other than value objects

id.description: The ID of the object, referenceable using a URI fragment

label.description: Human readable label for the object

description.description: Human readable description of the object

updatable.description: Specifies if the value of a data component can be updated externally (i.e., is variable)

optional.description: Specifies if the data for this component can be omitted in the datastream

definition.description: The definition of the property whose value is provided by this component (semantic link)

referenceFrame.description: Frame of reference (usually temporal or spatial) with respect to which the value of the component is expressed. A reference frame anchors a value to a real world datum.

axisID.description: Specifies the reference axis (refer to CRS axisID). The reference frame URI should also be specified unless it is inherited from parent Vector

nilValues.description: Defines reserved values with special meaning (e.g., missing, out-of-range, etc.)

value.description: Inline value(s) for the component. This property is optional to enable structure to act as a schema for values provided separately (e.g., in a datastream)

oneOf.description: Scalar component with integer representation used for a discrete counting value

allOf.description: Abstract base class for all data components

items.title: Link
items.description: Link object following standard Web Linking conventions (see RFC5988 and RFC6690)

hreflang.description: Language tag of target resource (2-letter language code, followed by optional 2-letter region code)

if.description: Interface used to access target resource (RFC 6690)
